summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 3, Sound View Addition to Queen Anne, being the alley from West Halladay Street to West Ray Street, between 9th Avenue West and 10th Avenue West, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 102929 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
